PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-18011997-12-040,  IA&ND,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendment to a Lease held by ECHO BAY MINES LTD. which adds another 49.44 hectares of land to its mining site near CONTWOYTO LAKE, in the Northwest Territories, which are to be used for the enlargement of both the quarry site and the road maintenance camp facilities.
Attachments
